{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer CR500 |revision=v1.x |asin=B06Y64RC5Y |newegg=N82E16825165016 |fcc_date=09/28/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=TE7CR500V1,TE7CR700V2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM33843;QAMLink, BCM33843GUKFSBG, CN1523 P20, E2CD N3A1; |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=FL128SA1F00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1543 P20, 547503-02 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331;BCM4331KMLG, TE1552 P21, 532532-01 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124;BCM53124SKMMLG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX, TP-LINK_XXXX_5G |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''866Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Dual Band DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/Archer-CR500.html}}{{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-CR500}} Web GUI: http://tplinkmodem.net FCC docs include a request for change in identification from TE7CR700V2 which is electrically identical. This device may be an artificially speed limited copy of the [[TP-LINK Archer CR700 v2.x]] with only two out of three spatial streams enabled. DOCSIS 3.0 16x4{{CableModemSpec |down_c=16 |up_c=4 }}
